text: On 19 April, a section of the 3rd RAMD launched an ambush in Sungai Limau, which succeeded in killing an Indonesian soldier. On 20 April 1964, 31 TNI troops attempted to capture a Malaysian army platoon position in Limau River, but the attack failed and 1 Indonesian troops were killed during this attack. == References == Category:20th-century battles Category:20th century in Malaysia
title: Battle of Limau River
